postContent:
Do you know that UAE has risen up the rankings to become the 4th most dominant fintech hub in the world just in the space of a few years, and another fact to really note is that 90%+ of those fintechs are using UAE as a launchpad to serve multiple markets and regions across MENA & the world!

Today I am delighted to announce the partnership with Khaleej Times KT Events WeValue Consulting ARC iACCEL GBI Bicky Riddhima Deepak to power igKnightED to empower the next wave of fintech founders across the region & their efforts to scale around the world

VBC will co-create thematic venture showcases, curated investor-founder engagements, and mentorship tracks tailored to the fintech space. The partnership also brings credibility and connectivity that will extend beyond the event itself, anchoring long-term ecosystem growth.

Save the dates! 18th & 19th November for BIT'25 & IgKnightED'25. Together, we’re building a space where collaboration meets innovation — and where ideas don’t just grow, they ignite.

Read more about the VBC's partnership in Khaleej Times
https://lnkd.in/dS4Ti5qn
author: Sidd Gandhi

postContent: We're excited to share that we're also leveraging EnableX's innovative Click-to-Call solution with integrated FaceAI.This technology is revolutionizing our customer interactions by enabling real-time emotion recognition during live video calls, allowing us to connect with our customers more empathetically and effectively.It's a significant step forward in enhancing our customer experience and engagement strategies.
author: Nimith Agrawal

postContent:
Last week, my wedding day became the center of an interesting discussion on work-life balance with some folks within our Startup Ecosystem, thanks to Vaibhav’s thoughtful post. First of all, I’m grateful that my dedication to AyushPay sparked such meaningful dialogue—after all, conversations like these are what help us grow as individuals and professionals.

For me, my wedding day was one of the most special moments of my life, and my life partner means the world to me. Yet, as a founder, I also have responsibilities that go beyond myself—to my investors, my employees, and the vision we’ve built together at AyushPay. The timing was far from ideal, but certain decisions that day were made with the good of the business in mind.

Does that mean I don’t value my wedding? Absolutely not. It was a balancing act between two deeply important aspects of my life. My wife, who has been my biggest support, stood by me even in this unconventional moment, and for that, I’ll forever be grateful.

Work-life balance isn’t a one-size-fits-all solution—it’s a deeply personal equation. While my choices may not resonate with everyone, I hope they inspire a reflection on the sacrifices and commitments we as Founders make in pursuit of our goals.

Vaibhav Jain Vivek Kapoor Colonel Hemraj Singh Parmar AyushPay
author: Nimith Agrawal

postContent: Check out this podcast episode of TiE Singapore, where our very own CEO, Pankaj Gupta and entrepreneur Saurav Bhattacharyya drop some serious knowledge on growing businesses across borders. They get into the nitty-gritty of what it really takes to expand internationally, something every #entrepreneur needs to hear. Their discussion provides a roadmap for navigating the complexities of international markets with real-life examples from their own journeys. Tune in now!
